chapter.section: Welcome to AdventureCraft Welcome to Adventure Craft, a kitchen sink adventure pack. This book includes some information to get you started.

Your First Tree
Since No Tree Punching is installed, getting your first piece wood and making your first tools is less straightforward. The steps can be summarized:
1. Get flint
You can get flint from gravel, either by breaking or crafting
2. First flint shards
Taking your piece of flint right click on a stone block to knap it into flint shards
3. Get a stick
To acquire sticks without tools, break tree leaves to get some sticks
4. Make a knife
Assemble your stick and flint shard to craft a flint knife
5. Get plant fiber
Break grass using the knife to acquire plant fiber
6. Flint Shards Again
Using the plant fiber, flint shards, and stick, craft a primitive hatchet
7. Primitive Hatchet
Chop down your first tree!
8. Actual Tools
Now with your newly acquired wood, start to make real tools by using Tinker's Construct (Or make other primitive tools using similar methods). You want to craft a Tool Station Patterns and a Stencil Table to make more tools To make armor you'll need to craft a Armor Station and Armor Forge
9. Better Tools
You'll eventually want to upgrade to metallic tools, which will need a smeltery. Alternatively, you could use some modded tools, or loot a dungeon for something.

section.title: You Changing Body and You
section.p: Most of the base mechanics are the same, but you have some additional quality of life improvements.
Press "R" to open a radial menu where you can setup key shortcuts.
You can pick up chests, furnaces, machines, etc. with your bare hands using In-Control Mod. (Check controls to configure)
Head to Options and Controls to set up keybinds for useful shortcuts

section.title: The World and You
section.p: There are many mods included in the pack ranging from tech to magic to nothing in particular. Here is but a few of your options:
Advanced Rocketry Build a rocket and go to the moon (and beyond)
Applied Energistics Storage and auto crafting
Arcane Archives Advanced Storage Solutions using rock vibes
Astral Sorcery Magic of the night skies
Bewitchment Salem witch trials in Minecraft
Blood Magic Sacrifice your blood for otherworldly powers
Botania Herbal Remedies and magic solutions
Chococraft Chocobos in minecraft
Compact Machines Building and boxing in multiple dimensions
Electroblob's Wizardry Magic wands and magic scrolls
Harvestcraft Breakfast, Dinner, Lunch options
Ice and Fire Tame and ride dragons
Kingdom Keys A mod with elements from a certain Square Enix title
Mekanism Tech Mod
NuclearCraft Nuclear reactors in minecraft
PSI Modern, Mathematical, Programmable Magic
Project Red Redstone for Electrical Engineers
RFTools Tech mod featuring many flexible tools
Roguelike Dungeons Rogue like Dungeons
Simply Jetpacks JETPACK
Thermal Foundation Tech Mod that does a bit of everything
Tinker's Armory Make your own armor
Tinker's Construct Make your own tool
Traveler's Backpack All in one backpack
Woot The penultimate mob farm

section.title: Asking For Help
section.p: If you need help for any feature or mod check, JEI or the mod's associated wiki page (if it has one).
(Google is your best friend!)
